attributes.action: Allow children to repeat the school year
attributes.additional_details: My son and many thousands of children have missed almost an entire school year this is vital for their future and I believe after listening to my sons wishes and others that all children should be allowed the opportunity to repeat the school year.
attributes.background: Allow all children to repeat the school year

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/326223
